backlog.convertToMarkdown.title: Convert to Markdown
backlog.preview.doubleClickToSwitchToEdi: Double click in the backlog preview to switch to the editor.
backlog.preview.fontFamily.desc: Controls the font family used in the backlog preview.
backlog.preview.fontSize.desc: Controls the font size in pixels used in the backlog preview.
backlog.preview.lineHeight.desc: Controls the line height used in the backlog preview. This number is relative to the font size.
backlog.preview.markEditorSelection.desc: Mark the current editor selection in the backlog preview.
When the backlog preview is scrolled, update the view of the editor.
backlog.preview.scrollPreviewWithEditorS: Scrolls the backlog preview to reveal the currently selected line from the editor.
backlog.preview.title: Open Preview
backlog.previewFrontMatter.dec: Sets how YAML front matter should be rendered in the backlog preview. 'hide' removes the front matter. Otherwise, the front matter is treated as backlog content.
backlog.previewSide.title: Open Preview to the Side
backlog.showSource.title: Show Source
backlog.styles.dec: A list of URLs or local paths to CSS style sheets to use from the backlog preview. Relative paths are interpreted relative to the folder open in the explorer. If there is no open folder, they are interpreted relative to the location of the backlog file. All '\' need to be written as '\\'.
backlog.trace.desc: Enable debug logging for the backlog extension.
backlog.refreshPreview.title: Refresh Preview
